cause.description:
Ozzy Osbourne has rocked for to long.
Ozzy has been there for us wen we needed a good rockin' now he needs us to help him retire, so he can keep his dignity instead of having to do a crappy reality show like the ousbournes, and to keep him from apearing in all of the rock award festivals in the world just to make a quick money.
Ozzy fans of the world!, donate money to help ozzy keep his dignity and buy himself a wheelchair!
AND LET'S SHOW CORPORATE AMERICA THAT METAL IS STILL ALIVE! - Chuck Schuldiner
1. Stop Ozzy from doing Reality Shows
2. Stop Ozzy from wasting his life away on stage
3. Help his family economically
cause.mission: Collection of Funds to help Aging Ozzy to retire from showbiz
cause.name: Help Ozzy Retire
